start(String) - Method in class EnigmaMachine
Split the String passed into an array of chars Decode each char using EnigmaMachine.encodeLetter(char) Add the decoded char to a StringBuilder After all the letters have been decoded, change the format of the result from StringBuilder to a String
substitute(char) - Method in class Plugboard
Each element from the ArrayList is selected using an IteratorPlugboard.returnIterator().Each of the sockets of the Plug is compared with the input char newChar and if there is a match the corresponding end is returned using Plug.encode(char), otherwise the input char is returned
substitute(int) - Method in class BasicRotor
The number passed as parameter is swapped with a different number by subtracting from it the current position of the rotor,checking if the new number still lies between the range 0-25,using the mapping at the new number, adding the position of the rotor back and checking one more time that the number is in the range 0-25.
substitute(int) - Method in class Reflector
The number passed as parameter is swapped with a different number by using the mapping at that index
substituteBack(int) - Method in class BasicRotor
The number passed as parameter is swapped with a different number by subtracting from it the current position of the rotor,checking if the new number still lies between the range 0-25,using the inverseMapping at the new number, adding the position of the rotor back and checking one more time that the number is in the range 0-25.
